https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wamED2BOPcwhDEGejtV6b4KmJjO.jpg Seven days before his graduation, high school student Maesawa Ryota discovers that he is a clone. While in a state of shock upon realizing he only has a short time left to live, he comes into contact with the original Maesawa Ryota. 7 Days Report
